global.environment:
PROJECT CASCADIA_NET PROJECT_2 CASCADIA_NET_0 AC_CODE gfz AC_CODE_CC GFZ RX3_VERSION _1_ RX3_PROJECT -PROJECT- RX3_SOLUTION GRP_1 |quality station based ob igs 1235 mail VERSION MIN_240209
HOME_PROCESSING /wrk/garcia/ DIR_MAINTENANCE $DIR_MAINTENANCE | ENV.variable DIR_EXT_INFO $DIR_EXT_INFO | ENV.variable
VERSIONS_SUB_DIR_NAME ITERA
ERROR_MAIL_TO garcia@gfz-potsdam.de | $IGS_ERROR_MAIL_TO --> MAIL_FROM garcia@gfz-potsdam.de | optional
IGS_ARCHIVE /dsk/repro3/ARCHIVE/IGS_GRE_2014/
EPOS8_BIN_EXEC $EPOS8_BIN_EXEC EPOS8_BIN_EXEC_TOOLS $EPOS8_BIN_EXEC_TOOLS EPOS8_TMP $EPOS8_TMP
SATELLITE_SYSTEMS_AMBFIX G
START_FROM_SCRATCH 1 DELETE_TEMP_FILES 1
MAX_PARALLEL_PRECALL 0 | 0 use std. (number of cores * 4) / n>0 number of threads MERGE_CLN_FILES 0 SITE_CLUSTER_SELECT 0 USE_NEW_DATA 1
IGNORE_DATA_PATHES MGEXIGU,IGU,IGULONG,SAPOS
SP3_STEP 900. INE_STEP 300. SAMPLING_RATE_ANA 300 SAMPLING_RATE_CLEAN 30 LENGTH_DATA_SHORT 2500 LENGTH_DATA_GAP 600 LENGTH_AMBIGUITY_GAP 3600 NUM_OBS_SHORT 8 SATELLITE_SYSTEMS G | e.g. G R where G=GPS, R=GLONASS, E=GALILEO WEIGHT_ELEVATION 75
REFERENCE_FRAME UNDEF | optional here; will be changed via definition in -stacoord- REFERENCE_CLOCK UNDEF | set automatically during: /products_igs
COMPRESS_TYPE gz | [Z|gz], how to compress files
SUM_FILE_EXT_CLEAN NONE | extension of *sum files at this analysis step SUM_FILE_EXT_POST_A nofix SUM_FILE_EXT_AMBFIX ambfix_cond SUM_FILE_EXT_POST_B NONE
global.options: PM debug 0 | debug level for some global processes file/dir. open/close file commands PM BINARY_ENDIAN BIG_ENDIAN PM warning_email 1 PM db_columns all | comma-separated list of main processing steps (e.g. begin,analysis,products; or use "all"); additional keywords: mjd, yyyy_ddd, comment
global.pathes:
PATH.BIN -EPOS8_BIN_EXEC- | executables (EPOS) PATH.BIN_TOOLS -EPOS8_BIN_EXEC_TOOLS- PATH.BIN_GGSP -EPOS8_BIN_GGSP-/CONTROL | parameters (PROJECT_GGSP)
PATH.CONTROL -EPOS8_BIN_PROJECT-/CONTROL
PATH.TMP -EPOS8_TMP-/-USER-
PATH.ARCH_ANA -IGS_ARCHIVE-/SAVE_ANA/-WWWW- PATH.ARCH_PROD -IGS_ARCHIVE-/SAVE_PROD_1d/-WWWW-
PATH.CNT -HOME_PROCESSING-/CONTROL PATH.RP_CNT /wrk/repro3/PROCESSING/CONTROL PATH.GEN_EOP -PATH.RP_CNT-/GEN_EOP
PATH.GEN_MOD -PATH.CNT-/GEN_MOD PATH.GEN_SAT -PATH.RP_CNT-/GEN_SAT
PATH.GEN_STA -PATH.CNT-/GEN_STA PATH.CNT_COMMON -PATH.CNT-/CNT_COMMON
PATH.NANU -PATH.CNT-/NANU PATH.CNT_PROJECT -PATH.CNT-/CNT_-PROJECT-_-VERSION-_-SATELLITE_SYSTEMS-_repro3
PATH.COMMON -HOME_PROCESSING-/COMMON PATH.CLN_RAW -PATH.COMMON-/CLN_RAW/-YYYY-_-DDD- PATH.OBS_RAW -PATH.COMMON-/OBS_RAW/-YYYY-_-DDD-
PATH.CLN -HOME_PROCESSING-/-PROJECT-/CLN/-YYYY-_-DDD- PATH.OBS -PATH.TMP-/-PROJECT-/OBS/-YYYY-_-DDD-
PATH.NET -HOME_PROCESSING-/-PROJECT-_-VERSION-/ANA/-YYYY-_-DDD-/NET PATH.NET_PROT -PATH.NET-/PROT PATH.NET_STA -PATH.NET-/STA PATH.NET_PROT_SITE -PATH.NET-/STA/-SITE-/PROT PATH.NET_ORB -PATH.NET-/ORB PATH.NET_ORB_WRK -PATH.NET-/ORB/WRK PATH.NET_ORB_SITE -PATH.NET-/STA/-SITE-/ORB PATH.NET_CNT -PATH.NET-/STA/-SITE-/CNTPATH.ARCH_ANA PATH.NET_OUT_SITE -PATH.NET-/STA/-SITE-/OUT PATH.NET_OUT -PATH.NET-/OUT
PATH.ANA -HOME_PROCESSING-/-PROJECT-/ANA/-YYYY-_-DDD- PATH.BEG -PATH.ANA-/BEG PATH.ORB -PATH.ANA-/ORB PATH.ORB_WRK -PATH.ANA-/ORB/WRK PATH.OUT -PATH.ANA-/OUT PATH.PROT -PATH.ANA-/PROT PATH.OUT_PROD -PATH.ANA-/OUT_PROD PATH.SAVE_ANA -HOME_PROCESSING-/-PROJECT-/REPORT/SAVE_ANA/-WWWW- PATH.SAVE_PROD -HOME_PROCESSING-/-PROJECT-/REPORT/SAVE_PROD_1d/-YYYY-/-DDD-
global.files:
-MPWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_MAIN_-VERSION-_-PROJECT-.log --PWK LOGFILE_ERRORS -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_-VERSION-_ERROR_WARNING.log --PWK CONFIG_WORK -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_CONFIG_FILE_-VERSION-_-PROJECT-.xml --PRK prod_meta_info -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/IGS_product_meta_info.cfg
--PWK database -HOME_PROCESSING-/-PROJECT-/-PROJECT-_STATUS_TABLE.-YYYY-
--PRK sta_data_sources -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_to_data_pathes.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- --PRK parametr -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/EPN_GRE_slv_ppp.par | parameter file --PRK parametr_ppp -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/EPN_GRE_slv_ppp.par | parameter file --PRK parametr_post_b -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/EPN_GRE_slv_ppp.par | parameter file --PRK parametr_smp_check -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/EPN_GRE_smp_check_MIN.par | sump check coordinates --PRK satorb_wei -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sat_orbconnect_weights.-YYYY- | for sump --PRK satorb_ex -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sat_orbconnect_exclude.-YYYY- | for sump --PRK clock_ref -PATH.CNT_COMMON-/sta_clock_ref_repro3 --PRK obs_type_sel_global -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_obs_type_select.FINAL --PWK rejectsta -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_sinex_reject | for sump --PRK sta_select_global -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_selection.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- --PRK sattab_global -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sat_selection --PRK stacoord_global -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_coordinates.-PROJECT-_-VERSION-
--PRK plut /dsk/repro3/PROCESSING/CONTROL/GEN_EOP/eop_initials.igs | initial pole values --PRK nutation_cor /dsk/repro3/PROCESSING/CONTROL/GEN_EOP/nutation_cor.igs | nutation corr from Bulletin --PRK bulletin_A /dsk/repro3/PROCESSING/CONTROL/GEN_EOP/eop_finals_daily | Bulletin A --PRK tai-utc /dsk/repro3/PROCESSING/CONTROL/GEN_EOP/eop_tai-utc.dat | leap seconds --PRK markerant -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/GFZ_custom_1.atx | antenna PCV --PRK cc2noncc_dat -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_dcb_p1c1 | P1C1 Diffential Code Biases --PRK emod -PATH.BEG-/mod_gravity_field.GOCO6s | Daily Earth gravity model --PRK emod_global -PATH.GEN_MOD-/GOCO6s.gfc | Global Earth gravity model --PRK jpl_de405 -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_JPLEPH | Planet's ephemerids --PRK octide -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/mod_ocean_tide.fes2014b | ocean tides harmonic --PRK plate -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_plate_motion.nuvel | plate tectonicb --PRK poleut1_tide -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_poleut1_tide_desai2016 | UT1 tides --PRK receiver_glo -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_receiver_corr_types | Corr. of receiver code biases --PRK tiut1 -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_tiut1 --PRK atmloads1s2 -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_atm_s1_s2_def_cm.dat | Atmosphere loading --PRK ocpoltidload -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_opoleloadcoefcmcor.txt | Ocean pole tide loading --PRK gpt2_grid -PATH.GEN_MOD-/mod_gpt2_5.grd | Grid file for trop model GPT2/VMF --PRK gpsp -PATH.GEN_SAT-/sat_parameters | GNSS satellite inform --PRK cc2noncc_dat -PATH.GEN_STA-/sta_receiver_p1c1bias.hist --PRK oload -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_oload_FES2014b.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- | ocean load coeff. --PRK snx_domes -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_domes.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- --PRK conv_4to9 -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_4to9.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- | conversion station name 4 to 9 --PRK coord_meteo -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_coord_meteo.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- | coordinates including height above NN --PRK namnum -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_nam2num.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- | list of station names and numbers --PRK statio_global -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_weighting.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- | minimal constrain by station where 1 means constrained and 7 uncontsrained --PRK takesta -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/hetra_core.-PROJECT-_-VERSION-.snx --PRK rinex_crux -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_rinex_obs.crx --PRK marker -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_antenna.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- --PRK snx_receiver -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/sta_receiver.-PROJECT-_-VERSION- --PRK nanu_sum -PATH.NANU-/nanus_sum.current --PWK sta_groups -PATH.CNT_COMMON-/sta_ambfix_groups.-PROJECT-_-VERSION-.cnf | groups of stations for AMBFIX baselines
--PRK orb_sp3_from -PATH.ARCH_PROD-/gfz_ovl-WWWWD-.sp3 | needed in PPP orbit --PRK orb_sp3_combi_from -PATH.ARCH_PROD-/gfz-WWWWD-.sp3 --PRK ineles_from -PATH.ARCH_ANA-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_-HH-_orb.ine --PRK shadow_from -PATH.ARCH_ANA-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_shadow | yaw angle --PRK sattab_from -PATH.ARCH_ANA-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sattab | yaw angle --PRK fused_from -PATH.ARCH_ANA-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_fused | fused navigation file --PRK satclock_from -PATH.ARCH_ANA-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sattime | fused navigation file --PRK slvtim_from -PATH.ARCH_ANA-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_times.sum | solve times sum --PRK orb_sp3_initial_from -PATH.ARCH_PROD-/gfz_ovl-WWWWD-.sp3 | needed in TB and PPP
--PRK logglobal -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/CLN_GLOBAL_CASCADIA_NET
--PWK sta_select -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_select_epoch --PWK sta_select_data -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_select_data --PWK sta_select_base -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_select_base --PWK sta_select_wish -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_select_wish --PWK sta_select_prep -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_select_prep --PWK statio -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_statio --PWK sattab -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sattab --PRK obs_type_sel -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_obs_types_select --PRK stacoord -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_stacoord | epoch-specific station coordinates
--PWK lograw&& -PATH.CLN_RAW-/raw_cln.-YYYY-_-DDD- --PWK logsta&& -PATH.CLN-/cln.-YYYY-_-DDD- --PWK logneu&& -PATH.CLN-/cln_new.-YYYY-_-DDD- --PWK md5_sum -PATH.CLN-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_md5_sum | MD5 sums of all used raw rinex files --PWK rinex&& -PATH.OBS-/rin.-YYYY-_-DDD- --PWK rin_raw&& -PATH.OBS_RAW-/raw_rin.-YYYY-_-DDD- -MPWK tb_clock_off -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_tb_clock_off --PRK inele -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orb_new.ine | named inenew, updated --PRK ineles -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_-HH_BEG-_orb.ine | ine-file --PWK nav_fused -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_fused --PWK satclock -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sattime
--PRK orb_sp3_initial -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orb_initial.sp3 | sp3-file --PRK orb_sp3_igr -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_-HH-_orb.sp3_igr --PRK orb_sp3_igr_combi -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_-HH-_orb.sp3_igr_combi --PRK shadow -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_shadow | shadow
--PRK yaw -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_yaw | yaw angle --PRK yawtmp -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_yawtmp | yaw angle output for --PRK orb&& -PATH.ORB_WRK-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orb&& | orbit file --PRK vaoe&& -PATH.ORB_WRK-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_vaoe&& | variation equations
--PRK amb -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_amb --PRK cooroutp -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_coordinates --PRK obsdata -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_session --PRK obseq -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sgl_ses | obs.equ./sngl --PRK obsresid -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv.res | resid file --PRK obsresorb -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_pdm.res | residuals file of PDM --PRK orbcorr -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_orbit | orbit correction, TEM --PRK orbcorr_fit -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orbcorr_fit | orbit correction, TEM --PWK outtimes -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_times --PWK outambig -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_ambig --PWK outtrop -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_trop
--PRK p4_stec -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_p4_stec | Geometry-free (P4) co --PRK dcb_p1p2 -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_dcb_p1p2 | Differential (P1-P2) --PRK gim_map_archive /dsk/igs_archive/TECMAP/CDDIS/-YYYY-/igsg-DDD-0.-YY-i | Ionosphere TEC map from IGS
--PWK gim_map -PATH.BEG-/igrg-DDD-0.-YY-i
--PWK parallel_status -PATH.NET-/STATUS/-YYYY-_-DDD-_net_parallel_status | NET parallel_status file
--PRK sat_del -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sat_delete --PRK slv_param_corr -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_param_corr | slv_param_corr --PRK slv_param_cor_tmp -GLOBAL:slv_param_corr-.TMP --PRK pol_predi -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_pol_predi.erp --PRK slvambig -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_ambig.sum | ambiguity --PRK slvtim -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_times.sum | solve times sum --PRK slvtrop -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_trop.sum | solve trop. sum --PRK slv_param_corr -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_param_corr | slv_param_corr --PRK stkres -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_slv_resid.stk | statistic of residual --PRK stkresorb -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_pdm_resid.stk | statistic of residual --PRK storenor -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_storenor --PRK storenor_post_a -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_storenor_post_a --PRK yawmax -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_yawmax.sum | maximum yaw rate and --PWK clock_ref_opt -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_clock_ref_opt
--PRK pol_orb -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_pol_orb.erp | for orbit generation --PRK pol_gfz -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_pol_cor.erp | pol corrections --PRK pol_final -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod.erp | final EOP solution --PRK sum -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_short_prod.sum | short summary (only list of stations) --PRK sp3bef -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-1-_prod.sp3 | sp3 file of previous day --PRK sp3 -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod.sp3 | overlapping sp3 with 15min sampling (22:00 - 02:00) --PRK sp3_orbcut -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod_cut.sp3 | sp3 with full day interval (00:00-23:45) --PRK sp3_5min -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod_5min.sp3 | overlapping sp3 with 5min sampling for FINAL's TB&PPP(22:00 - 02:00) --PWK trop_snx -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod.tro --PWK bias -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod.bias --PWK srp -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod.srp --PWK sinex -PATH.OUT_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod.snx
--PRK ambfix_cond -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_ambfix.cond | conditions for ambiguity fixing --PRK ambfix_sta&& -PATH.TMP-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_ambfix_sta | epoch wise list of ambiguity flags per satellite --PRK file_nofix -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_ambfix.nofix | no ambfix for this sta-sat-pairs --PRK file_nofix_tmp -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_ambfix.nofix_tmp --PRK resid_dif_chk_nofix -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_resid_dif_chk_nofix --PRK resid_dif_chk -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_resid_dif_chk --PRK resid_dif2ini -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_resid_dif2ini --PRK orbcio -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_prod_orb_igs_1d.sp3 | daily orbit --PRK sp3_quality_codes -PATH.CNT_PROJECT-/igs_sp3_quality_codes_std | standard sp3 quality codes --PRK orbdif -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orbdif_sp3_igr_igs --PRK vmf_grid /dsk/igs_archive/VMFG/-YYYY-/VMFG_-YYYY--MON--DOM-.H-HH- | VMFG files download from TU Vienna --PWK vmf_grid_work -PATH.BEG-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_VMFG | cated VMFG file
--PRK epoch_info_work -PATH.OUT-/EPOCH_INF | local

MERGE_files.options: PM do_anyway 0 | [0|1] do merge anyway PM allow_new_input 0 | [0|1] allow (automatic) merge, if input files are newer then output file PM cross_check 0 | [0|1] Compare existing sites in stacoord vs. the merged files PM add_svn_header 0 | [0|1] Add additional header with blank svn keywords

COPY_FILES.prepare.files: --PRK sp3.from -GLOBAL:orb_sp3_from-.-COMPRESS_TYPE- --PWK sp3.to -GLOBAL:orb_sp3_igr- --PRK ine.from -GLOBAL:ineles_from-.Z --PWK ine.to -GLOBAL:ineles- --PRK shadow.from -GLOBAL:shadow_from-.Z --PWK shadow.to -GLOBAL:shadow- --PRK satclock.from -GLOBAL:satclock_from-.Z --PWK satclock.to -GLOBAL:satclock- --PRK slvtim.from -GLOBAL:slvtim_from-.Z --PWK slvtim.to -GLOBAL:slvtim- --PRK sp3_initial.from -GLOBAL:orb_sp3_initial_from-.-COMPRESS_TYPE- --PWK sp3_initial.to -GLOBAL:orb_sp3_initial-

CREATE_temp_staselect.options: PM data_only_up_cluster_number 0 PM include_backup_stations 1 PM source_data_path obs | [obs|cln] - get list of files from PATH.RAWOBS or PATH.CLN PM check_EPOCH_INF 0 | check data valid in epo_len from EPOCH_INF file. need BLOCK CREATE_temp_EPOCH_INF see. CONFIG_RTT PM check_EPOCH_INF_last_hour 0 | check data valid in epo_len from EPOCH_INF file for RTT routine job. PM check_EPOCH_INF_min_data 80 | check valid data [%] of epo_len in EPOCH_INF file. PM min_number_sta_select_base 30 PM min_number_sta_select_data 1 PM check_marker 1 | check the antenna availibity from marker file PM check_receiver 1 | check the receiver availibity from snx_receiver file PM ignore_data_pathes IGU
CREATE_temp_staselect.files:
--PRK sta_data_sources -GLOBAL- | data sources --PRK sta_select -GLOBAL- -MPWK sta_select_prep -GLOBAL- | created from sta_select, include also backup stations -MPWK sta_select_base -GLOBAL- -MPWK sta_select_wish -GLOBAL- | wish list -MPWK sta_select_data -GLOBAL-
--PRK logglobal -GLOBAL- --PRK epoch_info_work -GLOBAL- | currently unused --PRK marker -GLOBAL- --PRK snx_receiver -GLOBAL-

CREATE_sta_coord_epoch.options: PM interval_info -MJD- 1 | :start epoch: [mjd] and :length: [days] PM max_psd_diff 0.1 | max 3D-diff between psd and mean psd model [mm]; default 0.5[mm] PM create_statio | create statio based on stations presence in reference frame solution PM initial_weights 1 1 | phase code
CREATE_sta_coord_epoch.files: --PRK statio_global -GLOBAL- | additional weighting information --PWK statio -GLOBAL- | resulting statio --PRK sta_select -GLOBAL:sta_select_prep- | station selection --PRK stacoord_global -GLOBAL- | initial set of station coordinates and velocities --PRK snx_domes -GLOBAL- | station domes numbers --PWK coovel_snx -PATH.GEN_STA-/ITRF2020P_posvel.snx | ITRF2020 (or equivalent) station position/velocity solution --PWK psd_snx -PATH.GEN_STA-/ITRF2020P_psd.snx | ITRF2020 (or equivalent) post sesmic model components --PWK soln_snx -PATH.GEN_STA-/ITRF2020P_soln.snx | ITRF2020 (or equivalent) solution epoch definition --PWK stacoord -GLOBAL- | epoch-specific station coordinates

CREATE_gravity_epoch.files: --PRK emod_global -GLOBAL- | additional weighting information --PWK emod -GLOBAL- | resulting statio

CREATE_temp_VMFG.files: --PRK vmf_grid -GLOBAL- | VMFG files download from TU wien --PWK vmf_grid_work -GLOBAL- | cated VMFG file

control.include:
WAIT_MODE 0 MAX_SUB_PRECALL_ERRORS 100 | Max. allowed number of errors in CREATE_rinex_raw_cc2noncc_trimcorr
REPLACE /prepare_data/CREATE_rinex_raw_cc2noncc_trimcorr/options :: PM save_md5_sum 0 | save MD5 sum of all raw rinex files
MIN_DATA_PERCENT 50 | [%] min. data to be used DEL_STA_LIMIT_GOOD 50 | [%], TB_clean: delete sta with flag 'BAD', skip delete if number of good observations > del_sta_limit_good [>0] DELETE /clean_data/RUN_TB_clean/options :: keep_end INSERT /clean_data/RUN_TB_clean/options :: RM check_phase_sys G | [G|R|E|C], satellite systems for which LC checks shall be done REPLACE /clean_data/RUN_TB_clean/options :: RM cutoff_elevation 3 | lower limit of elevation
DELETE /sample/RUN_sample/options :: rnx3_to_2 DELETE_RINEX_RAW 1 | [0|1] - delete rin_raw files after /RUN_sample from PATH.TMP, otherwise they are copied to PATH.OBS_RAW

ppp_orbit.files: -MPWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_PPP_ORBIT.log --PRK orb_sp3 -GLOBAL:orb_sp3_igr- | -PATH.ORB-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orb.sp3 --PWK orb&& -PATH.ORB_WRK-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_orb&& --PWK vaoe&& -PATH.ORB_WRK-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_vaoe&& | variation equations

RUN_ORBIT.options: PM version_runc new PM version_fltab new PM start_from_scratch 1 | for first iteration only RM startwith orbit | special to ppp with existing orbits RM sp3_orb RM ..prilun RM ..ppp_mode RM target orbint RM geopot 12 12 12 0 0 0 RM em_not_tidefree RM ..listorbit 1 RM ..priearth RM seculpol 51544. 0.054 0.357 0.00083 0.00395 | trend/year RM ..no_em_timvar RM ..only_twobody RM ..no_nonsphere RM ..no_solid_tides RM ..no_ocean_tides RM ..nocscorr RM ..no_mercury RM ..no_venus RM ..no_mars RM ..no_jupiter RM ..no_saturn RM ..no_uranus RM ..no_neptune RM ..no_pluto RM ..no_moon RM ..no_sun RM ..no_relati RM shadow 1 0 RM pec-iter 1 RM imp_arc RM ..nodata RM ..use_sesshd | to get CTRL% from session header whith target "orbint" only RM ..noorbint RM ..tim_ctrl -MJD_BEG-. -SEC_BEG-. -MJD_END-. -SEC_END-. RM ..norelcor RM ..noyawcontrol RM pcv_file abs_sat:ele_rec:azi RM nosatazi_pcv RM ..pcv_file rel_sat:non_rec:ele RM ..norecazi_pcv -PATH. RM sumtrop RM meteo_model GPT2 | or GPT2 for new mete model ( from 2012 TU wien) RM trop_model SAAST VMF RM tide_displace SOLID_OCEAN_POLE RM no_oload_stop RM ..nophasewindup RM ..no_yawupdate RM ..pv_only_update RM ..pdm6_update RM big_dif 50 RM ..no_otl_hardisp RM jplradiation RM meanpole_IERS2018
RUN_ORBIT.files: -MPWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_pdm7.log F-PRK emod -GLOBAL- | Earth gravity model F-PRK gpsp -GLOBAL- | GNSS satellite inform F-PRK jpl_de405 -GLOBAL- | JPL planetary eph. 40 F-PRK marker -GLOBAL- | ant. name and offset F-PRK markerant -GLOBAL- | antenna PCV F-PRK octide -GLOBAL- | ocean tides harmonic F-PRK oload -GLOBAL- | ocean load coeff. F-PRK plate -GLOBAL- | plate tectonics F-PRK plut -GLOBAL- | pole&ut1r F-PRK nutation_cor -GLOBAL- | nutation cor from BullA F-PRK poleut1_tide -GLOBAL- | poleut1_tide F-PRK sattab -GLOBAL- | sattab F-PRK stacoord -GLOBAL- | sta coordinates F-PRK satclock -GLOBAL- | navigation clocks F-PRK ineles -GLOBAL- | named ine, initial F-PRK inele -GLOBAL- | named inenew, updated F-PWK orbcorr_fit -GLOBAL- | orbit correction, TEM F-PRK obsdata -GLOBAL- | ses-file F-PWK obseq -GLOBAL- | obs.equ./sngl F-PWK orb&& -TASK- | orbit files (binary) F-PRK orb_sp3 -TASK- | sp3 orbit file = INPUT F-PRK parametr -GLOBAL:parametr_ppp- | parameter file F-PWK pdm_nominals tmp_pdm_nominals | nominal file F-PWK slvambig -GLOBAL- | ambiguity F-PWK slvtim -GLOBAL- | solve times sum F-PWK slvtrop -GLOBAL- | solve trop. sum F-PRK obsresorb -GLOBAL- | residuals file of PDM F-PRK shadow -GLOBAL- | shadow F-PRK sta_select -GLOBAL:sta_select- F-PWK stkresorb -GLOBAL- | statistic of residual F-PWK vaoe&& -TASK- | variation equations F-PWK varh tmp_varh | variation temp. F-PWK yaw -GLOBAL- | yaw angle F-PWK yawtmp -GLOBAL- | yaw angle output for F-PRK yawmax -GLOBAL- | maximum yaw rate and F-PWK TMP&& tmp_&& | TMP-file F-PRK atmloads1s2 -GLOBAL- F-PRK ocpoltidload -GLOBAL-

control.include:
CHECK_FIRST_ITERA 1 | check for large outliers in 1st iteration MAX_STA_OUTLIERS :50 | max bad satellites per station [%] (0: no check) MAX_PRN_OUTLIERS :50 | max bad stations per satellite [%] (0: no check) KEEP_CLOCK_OFFSETS 1 INSERT /analysis/ITERATION_management/files :: ---RK tb_clock_off -GLOBAL- | list of time offset estimates from TB REPLACE /analysis/ITERATION_management/options :: RM delete_sum_files 0 REPLACE /analysis/ITERATION_management/options :: RM fix_orbit 1 INSERT /analysis/ITERATION_management/options :: PM check_core_update_stab 1 | enables core sta check (key cost line station) INSERT /analysis/RUN_SOLVE/options :: RM storenor[post_a] INSERT /analysis/RUN_SOLVE/files :: F--WK storenor[post_a] -GLOBAL-_posta REPLACE /analysis/RUN_HETRA_COORD/files :: F-PRK sta1 -GLOBAL:stacoord- INSERT /analysis/RUN_HETRA_COORD/files :: F-PRK takesta -GLOBAL-
MIN_STA_PER_SAT 1 | [-] Min. num. of stations with data to a satellite (INSES) MIN_STA_NUMBER 10 | [-] Min. number of stations required MIN_STA_OBS 50 10 10 | [%] Min. obs per station; sorted by sat.system MIN_SAT_OBS 50 10 10 | [%] Min. obs per satellite; sorted by sat.system INSERT /analysis/CREATE_session/options :: RM elevation 3
INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RO brdc_clock_res_check 1.0 | [km] - Limit of residuals when BRDC clocks were used
INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM albedomodel 1 1 2 INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM meanpole_IERS2018 INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/files :: F--RK orb_sp3 -GLOBAL:orb_sp3_igr- INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM isbref_zero | reset a priori clock offset to zero for previous isb_ref_sta INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM gal_yaw_model INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM em_not_tidefree INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM sp3_orb INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM big_dif 50 INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM startwith data INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM meteo_model GPT2 | or GPT2 for new mete model ( from 2012 TU wien) INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM trop_model SAAST VMF INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM target obsmod
INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/options :: RM ant_align_to_N INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/files :: F-PWK dcb_p1p2 -GLOBAL:dcb_p1p2-
INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/files :: F-PWK p4_stec -GLOBAL:p4_stec- INSERT /analysis/RUN_ORBIT/files :: F-PRK VMFgrid -GLOBAL:vmf_grid_work-
INSERT /analysis/RUN_AMBFIX/options :: RM sta_groups 2 | 1=baseline in groups; 2= also between groups added INSERT /analysis/RUN_AMBFIX/files :: F--RK sta_groups -GLOBAL-
INSERT /analysis/RUN_SOLVE/options :: RM fix_isb_refsta -3 | ISB of RefSta fixed to that level REPLACE /analysis/RUN_SOLVE/options :: RM combil3p3 500.0 | orig: 500.0 - Measurement Noise Ratio P3/L3

RUN_PRODUCT_SUMP.options: PM version_runc old PM version_fltab old RM automatic RM innerconstraints RM ignore unused_parameter RM no_newstore RM sum_neq RM nocmpstatio RM changeocc RM prinormal 12 RM gmref 0.4415 RM gmstor 49352.5 0.4410 54043. 0.4418 99999. 0.4415 RM cooroutp RM ..rejectsta RM solutinterval 1. 1. RM priconstraints RM pricompress RM stop_rms 100 | defaut value 100
RUN_PRODUCT_SUMP.files: --PWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_sump_stafree.log F-PRK storenor -GLOBAL- | output of POST_B F-PRK ref_staco -GLOBAL:stacoord- F-PRK gpsp -GLOBAL- | GNSS satellite inform F-PRK marker -GLOBAL- F-PRK snx_antenna -GLOBAL:markerant- F-PRK parametr -GLOBAL:parametr_smp_check- F-PRK statio -GLOBAL- F-PRK sattab -GLOBAL- F-PRK snx_domes -GLOBAL- | station domes numbers F-PRK snx_receiver -GLOBAL- F-PWK cooroutp -GLOBAL-.smp_stafree F-PWK slv_param_corr -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_smp_param_corr_stafree F-PWK stkres -PATH.TMP-/-PID-_smp_stafree_stkres_tmp F-PWK inphistory -PATH.TMP-/-PID-_smp_stafree_inphistory_tmp F-PWK nominals -PATH.TMP-/-PID-_smp_stafree_nominals_tmp

RUN_HETRA_COORD.options:
PM version_runc old PM version_fltab old
PM create_takesta 0 | from -statio- PM check_core_sta 30 | mm for residuals in hetra; =0 skipped
RM sta_num_4 RM repeat 5 2 RM ...parabest 1110000 RM ...staout 1 RM ...rejecsta RM ...takesta RM solutfile
RUN_HETRA_COORD.files: --PWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_hetra_slvfix_vs_smpfree.log --PRK statio -GLOBAL- F-PRK sta1 -GLOBAL:cooroutp- F-PRK sta2 -GLOBAL:cooroutp-.smp_stafree F-PWK solutfile -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_hetra_slvfix_vs_smpfree

RUN_HETRA_COORD.options:
PM version_runc old PM version_fltab old
PM create_takesta 0 | from -statio- PM check_core_sta 20 | mm for residuals in hetra; =0 skipped
RM sta_num_4 RM repeat 5 2 RM ...parabest 1110000 RM staout 1 RM ...rejecsta RM takesta RM solutfile PM update_statio 7
RUN_HETRA_COORD.files: --PWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_hetra_slvfix_vs_apriori.log --PRK statio -GLOBAL- F-PRK sta1 -GLOBAL:stacoord- F-PRK sta2 -GLOBAL:cooroutp- F-PRK takesta -GLOBAL- F-PRK staout -GLOBAL:cooroutp-_hetra_slvfix_vs_apriori F-PWK solutfile -PATH.OUT-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_hetra_slvfix_vs_apriori

RUN_PRODUCT_POLE.options: PM version_runc old PM version_fltab old PM input_from sump | [solve|sump] Input file format needed to define executable. RM ut_type ORIG | UT1|UT1R|ORIG RM ut_ref_epoch -MJD-. RM ut_dayfraction 0. RM days/file 1 RM beg_end -MJD-1- -MJD- RM week -WWWW- RM ..test_initials
RUN_PRODUCT_POLE.files: --PWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_prod_erp.log F-PRK slv_param_cor -GLOBAL:slv_param_corr- F-PWK pol_gfz -GLOBAL- F-PWK pol_orb -GLOBAL- F-PWK pol_final -GLOBAL- F-PRK tiut1 -GLOBAL- F-PWK tmp_pol -PATH.TMP-/-WWWWD-_igr_erp_tmp

RUN_PRODUCT_SUMP.sinex.options:
PM version_runc old PM version_fltab old
RM automatic RM innerconstraints RM ..ut_calibration RM ..constr_sta RM ..ignore unused_parameter RM make_sinex RM miss_split allowed RM nocmpstatio | no compress statio, immer by sump RM changeocc RM gmref 0.4415 | 398600. + RM gmstor 49352.5 0.4410 54043. 0.4418 99999. 0.4415 | 398600. + RM cooroutp RM ..no_newstore RM ..rejectsta | Stations in 'rejectsta' not used RM solutinterval 1. 1. RM sum_neq | NEQ in einem Block behandeln; starker Einfluss auf Auswertung! RM stop_rms -SUMP_STOP_RMS- RM snx_normalequa | Output of SNX with NEQ format RM rep_align_to_N RM priinnerconstraints RM prinormal 12 RM priinverse 12 RM priconneq 12
RUN_PRODUCT_SUMP.sinex.files:
--PWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_prod_snx.log
F-PRK storenor -GLOBAL-
F-PRK rejectsta -GLOBAL- F-PRK ref_staco -GLOBAL:stacoord- F-PRK marker -GLOBAL- F-PRK snx_domes -GLOBAL- F-PRK snx_receiver -GLOBAL- F-PRK snx_antenna -GLOBAL:markerant- F-PRK gpsp -GLOBAL- | GNSS satellite inform F-PRK tiut1 -GLOBAL- F-PRK tai-utc -GLOBAL- F-PRK sattab -GLOBAL- F-PRK statio -GLOBAL- F-PRK parametr -GLOBAL:parametr_smp_check- F-PRK namnum -GLOBAL- F-PRK prod_meta_info -GLOBAL-
F-PWK slv_param_corr -GLOBAL-.smp_snx_1d F-PWK cooroutp -GLOBAL-.smp_snx_1d F-PWK sinex -GLOBAL- F-PWK newstore -GLOBAL:storenor-.smp_snx_1d F-PWK inphistory -PATH.TMP-/-PID-_smp_snx_1d_inphistory_tmp F-PWK nominals -PATH.TMP-/-PID-_smp_snx_1d_nominals_tmp F-PWK stkres -PATH.TMP-/-PID-_smp_snx_1d_stkres_tmp

RUN_PRODUCT_TRO.options: PM trop_model VMF PM elevation_angle 3 | [deg] PM sample_trop_prod 3600 | [s] - Intervall of TRO product PM trop_sinex_version 2.00 | 0.01 or 2.00
RUN_PRODUCT_TRO.files: -MPWK LOGFILE -PATH.PROT-/-LOGNUM-_prod_tro.log --PRK slv_param_corr -GLOBAL- | Troposphere solution --PRK stacoord -GLOBAL:cooroutp- | Coordinates solution --PRK last_pdm7_log -PATH.PROT-/-WHATEVER-_pdm7_3_post_b.log --PRK sinex -GLOBAL- --PRK conv_4to9 -GLOBAL- --PRK prod_meta_info -GLOBAL- | PRODUCT META INFO: 'TRO' block --PRK coord_meteo -GLOBAL- --PWK trop_snx -GLOBAL-

COPY_FILES.save_PROD_files.files:
--PRK snx.from -GLOBAL:sinex- --PWK snx.to -PATH.SAVE_PROD-/-AC_CODE_CC-_-RX3_VERSION-_-RX3_PROJECT-_-RX3_SOLUTION-_-YYYY-_-DDD-_SAT_-SATELLITE_SYSTEMS-_MIN-.SNX
--PRK cooroutp1.from -GLOBAL:cooroutp- --PWK cooroutp1.to -PATH.SAVE_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_coordinates_min_-RX3_SOLUTION-.adj
--PRK cooroutp2.from -GLOBAL:cooroutp-.smp_stafree --PWK cooroutp2.to -PATH.SAVE_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_coordinates_min_-RX3_SOLUTION-.free
--PRK cooroutp3.from -GLOBAL:cooroutp-_hetra_slvfix_vs_apriori --PWK cooroutp3.to -PATH.SAVE_PROD-/-YYYY-_-DDD-_sta_coordinates_hetra_adj_vs_apriori_min_-RX3_SOLUTION-
